attributes.action: Want to no how been done for animal cruelty round my area
attributes.background: I'm doing this due to 2 of animals being injured badly what my vets is believed to be done by human would like to no were I need to keep my animals safe and if any how close they to were I live think we have the right to no due to keeping our animals safe

rejection.details: This doesn't sound like something that the UK Government or Parliament can help you with. If you're worried about crime against animals in your area, you could speak to your local police.
